messages.content: It's time for a change. Vote Green to tackle climate chaos, invest in our communities and protect our countryside.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Other parties pay lip service to the climate emergency. Only the Greens will take the bold, ambitious action needed to save our living planet and stop climate chaos.

Our planning system puts developer profit before local need and our natural environment. I will campaign for policy reform that puts nature and ecology, local need, and true affordability at the heart of planning.
The people must have the final say on any EU withdrawal agreement. Greens will campaign hard to Remain.
Investment in green energy, infrastructure and housing, creating a million green-collar jobs and helping create the clean low-carbon economy of the future.
Years of austerity have left our schools and NHS chronically underfunded. Greens will reverse austerity and re-invest in our essential services.
